data.content:
adjective
[more ~; most ~]
made so that a child cannot open it
a childproof bottle
made safe for children
a childproof home [=a home where dangerous objects, chemicals, etc., have been removed or placed where children cannot get them]
verb
-proofs; -proofed; -proofing
[+ obj] :to make (a place) safe for children
The article has tips on how to childproof a home.
